items.sentence: If today was your last day on Earth, what would you like to eat?
When was the last time Tom and you went out for dinner together?
I think it\'s important that we finish doing this before Monday.
Tom got out from behind his desk and went over to open a window.
Tom handed Mary a piece of paper with his address written on it.
Tom listened to the message that Mary had left on his voicemail.
I want to make sure that we don't make the same mistake you did.
How different do you think the world will be in a hundred years?
A few years ago, I wouldn't have thought this would be possible.
I know I've met that guy over there, but I don't remember where.
